data.text: @TheAtlantic @ebruenig Ah... Now that "misinformation" has became "THE SCIENCE"™ it can be tolerated
@TheAtlantic @ebruenig Opinion | The Atlantic’s elevation of MBS is an insult to journalism  https://t.co/WVpYYjcgel
@TheAtlantic @ebruenig No story here. Why wouldn't you? Prison has got to be hell.

@TheAtlantic @ebruenig Why is dying a big deal? Someone gets to forcibly kill someone else and we say “25 years”? Then they get out with a smile on their face. How is that justice? That is not justice. We need to bring back the death penalty 🤷‍♀️
